text: Hugo Vetlesen (born 29 February 2000) is a Norwegian footballer who plays for Bodø/Glimt. ==Career== ===Club=== On 5 October 2020, Vetlesen left Stabæk to sign for Bodø/Glimt until the end of 2023. == Career statistics == ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- | rowspan="5"|Stabæk |2017 | rowspan="4"|Eliteserien |26||0||5||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||31||0 |- |2018 |24||1||3||0||colspan="2"|–||1||0||28||1 |- |2019 |24||0||3||1||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||26||1 |- |2020 |19||4||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||19||4 |- !colspan="2"|Total !93!!5!!11!!1!!-!!-!!1!!0!!105!!6 |- | rowspan="2"|Bodø/Glimt |2020 | rowspan="1"|Eliteserien |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||0||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !0!!0!!0!!0!!-!!-!!-!!-!!0!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !93!!5!!11!!1!!-!!-!!1!!0!!105!!6 |} ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Eliteserien players Category:Stabæk Fotball players Category:Association football midfielders
